8fb414a2-d934-4c8e-82f4-95af1ad6c6f3.description: This badge is awarded to Mentee participants in Hearst Newspapers who complete the Reach mentor program and exhibit dedicated participation. The 6-month program allows participants to actively engage in a meaningful partnership that can ultimately support career growth and build core skills. Participants are offered the opportunity to attend four workshops, network with other cohort participants, and to set achievable goals.
8fb414a2-d934-4c8e-82f4-95af1ad6c6f3.name: HNP Reach Mentor Program - Mentee

badge_template_activities.title: Participants are required to have met with their program-matched mentor no fewer than ten times throughout the 6-month program.
Participants must attend three of the four workshops offered; mentee essentials training, Predictive Index workshop, mid-point networking workshop, and the closing celebration call.

2b889586-ce5c-485f-ab88-666ef86d2aea.description: This badge is awarded to Mentor participants at Hearst Newspapers who complete the Reach mentor program and exhibit dedicated participation. The 6-month program allows participants to actively engage in a meaningful partnership that can ultimately support career growth and build core skills. Participants are offered the opportunity to attend four workshops, network with other cohort participants, and set achievable goals.
2b889586-ce5c-485f-ab88-666ef86d2aea.name: HNP Reach Mentor Program - Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: Participants are required to have met with their program-matched mentee no fewer than ten times throughout the 6-month program.
Participants must attend three of the four workshops offered; mentee essentials training, Predictive Index workshop, mid-point networking workshop, and the closing celebration call.

00a373b9-1da4-4a81-9c83-25c861e649c9.description: This badge is awarded to employees at Hearst Newspapers who complete the Engage Emerging Talent program. The 6-month program partners with LifeLabs Learning to provide high-potential employees career building skills. Participants go through 8 workshops or around 15 hours of training that help build skills on topics such as adaptivity and resilience, communication, and feedback skills. Participants also complete a 360 feedback exercise and a Predictive Index assessment.
00a373b9-1da4-4a81-9c83-25c861e649c9.name: HNP Engage Emerging Talent Program Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must complete all Engage Foundations sessions: Orientation and Kickoff, Understanding Yourself, and Understanding Hearst Newspapers' Strategies.

Participants must complete five 2-hour individual contributor workshops with LifeLabs Learning. The workshops are; adaptivity & resilience, influential communication, feedback skills, productivity & prioritization, and career growth.
Participants must take a Predictive Index survey that assesses their work styles and how they interact with their colleagues.
Participants must complete a Culture Amp 360 feedback exercise that helps participants understand their strengths and opportunities in the workplace.

1d58f5f4-3a15-4037-bf5b-40311a18f061.description: This badge is awarded to employees at Hearst Newspapers who complete the Engage Manager program. The 12-month program partners with LifeLabs Learning to provide foundational managerial skills. Participants go through 15 workshops or around 30 hours of training that help build skills on topics such as leadership, coaching, people development, feedback, and productivity. Participants also complete a 360 feedback exercise and a Predictive Index assessment.
1d58f5f4-3a15-4037-bf5b-40311a18f061.name: HNP Engage Manager Program Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must complete all Engage Foundations sessions: Orientation and Kickoff, Understanding Yourself, Understanding Hearst Newspapers' Strategies, and Understanding Your Teams.

Participants must complete five 2-hour Core 1 foundational workshops with LifeLabs Learning. The workshops are; coaching skills, feedback skills, productivity & prioritization, effective 1:1s, and manager intensive 1.

Participants must complete five 2-hour Core 2 strategic workshops with LifeLabs Learning. The workshops are; strategic thinking, meeting management, leading change, people development, and manager intensive 2.
Participants must take a Predictive Index survey that assesses their work styles and how they interact with their colleagues.
Participants must complete a Culture Amp 360 feedback exercise that helps participants understand their strengths and opportunities in the workplace.

8dc2ca4b-e61a-49ae-b203-95b2140dae50.description: This badge is awarded to employees at Hearst Newspapers who complete the Engage Senior Manager program. The 5-month program partners with Harvard Business Publishing Corporate Learning to provide strategic leadership skills. Participants go through 11 workshops or around 25 hours of training that help build skills on topics such as leadership, coaching, people development, feedback, and productivity. Participants also complete a 360 feedback exercise and a Predictive Index assessment.
8dc2ca4b-e61a-49ae-b203-95b2140dae50.name: HNP Engage Senior Manager Program Graduate

badge_template_activities.title: Participants must complete all Engage Foundations sessions: Orientation and Kickoff, Understanding Yourself, Understanding Hearst Newspapers' Strategies, and Understanding Your Teams.
Completed coursework that required upwards of 3 hours of work per week.
Participated in 9.5 hours of online training webinars targeted at building strong team management skills.
Participants must take a Predictive Index survey that assesses their work styles and how they interact with their colleagues.
Participants must complete a Culture Amp 360 feedback exercise that helps participants understand their strengths and opportunities in the workplace.
